prompts.label: Clean Architecture Solution Template
prompts.prompt: Generate a .NET solution for {project} using Clean Architecture (Domain, Application, Infrastructure, Web). Include DI wiring, MediatR use cases, validation, logging, and example endpoint. Provide folder structure and minimal code stubs.

prompts.label: Dependency Rule Enforcement
prompts.prompt: Add tooling/lint rules to enforce dependency boundaries.

prompts.label: Modularization Plan
prompts.prompt: Break {system} into modules/services with seams.

prompts.label: Project Structure & Boundaries
prompts.prompt: Propose scalable project structure for {project} with boundaries and dependency rules.

prompts.label: Use Case Template
prompts.prompt: Create use case template for {feature} with ports/adapters.

prompts.label: Database Migrations
prompts.prompt: Create migration strategy for {schema_change} including zero-downtime rollout.

prompts.label: EF Core Repository & Unit of Work
prompts.prompt: Create an EF Core repository pattern with Unit of Work for transactional operations. Include async methods, paging, filtering, and support for specification/query pattern.

prompts.label: Indexing & Query Optimization
prompts.prompt: Analyze queries for {entity} and propose indexes and pagination.

prompts.label: Soft Delete & Auditing
prompts.prompt: Add soft delete and auditing metadata for {entity}.

prompts.label: Transactions & Consistency
prompts.prompt: Implement transactional behavior for {use_case} and explain isolation levels.

prompts.label: Error Handling & Logging Middleware
prompts.prompt: Build ASP.NET Core middleware for centralized exception handling and structured logging (Serilog). Return RFC7807 ProblemDetails with correlation IDs.

prompts.label: Hosted BackgroundService
prompts.prompt: Implement a BackgroundService that processes queued jobs with graceful shutdown, retry/backoff, cancellation tokens, and telemetry.

prompts.label: OpenTelemetry Instrumentation
prompts.prompt: Instrument {service} with OpenTelemetry traces and metrics: spans, attributes, propagation, sampling.

prompts.label: Resilience with Polly
prompts.prompt: Add resilience to outgoing HTTP calls using IHttpClientFactory + Polly policies (retry, circuit breaker, timeout, bulkhead). Include jittered backoff and telemetry.

prompts.label: Structured Logging Standard
prompts.prompt: Define structured logging for {service} including correlation IDs and redaction rules.

prompts.label: Authorization Policy Design
prompts.prompt: Design authorization policies for {app} (roles/claims/ABAC), least privilege, and tests.

prompts.label: Input Validation & Sanitization
prompts.prompt: Harden input handling for {endpoint} including SSRF/path traversal defenses.

prompts.label: JWT Authentication & Authorization
prompts.prompt: Configure JWT authentication in ASP.NET Core, add role/claim-based authorization policies, and secure endpoints with proper 401/403 responses.

prompts.label: OAuth2/OIDC Flow Selection
prompts.prompt: Choose OAuth2/OIDC flow for {client_type} with PKCE and refresh strategy.

prompts.label: Secrets Management
prompts.prompt: Propose secrets management for {system} including rotation and least privilege.

prompts.label: CQRS with MediatR
prompts.prompt: Implement CQRS for {feature} using MediatR: Command, Query, Handlers, Validators, and pipeline behaviors (logging, validation). Include unit tests.

prompts.label: Integration Test Template

prompts.label: Integration Tests (WebApplicationFactory)

prompts.prompt: Implement JWT authentication and role-based authorization for {app} in Node.js ({framework}). Include token refresh strategy, secure cookie vs header choice, and 401/403 handling.

prompts.label: OAuth2/OIDC Flow Selection
prompts.prompt: Choose OAuth2/OIDC flow for {client_type} with PKCE and refresh strategy.

prompts.label: Secrets Management

prompts.prompt: Create an integration test setup for {target} including seeding, teardown, and assertions for success + failure.

prompts.label: Jest Tests (Unit + Integration)

prompts.prompt: Create a NestJS feature module for {feature}. Include controller, service, DTO validation (class-validator), exception filters, and integration tests.

prompts.prompt: Write comprehensive unit tests for {target} focusing on edge cases, boundary values, and exception paths. Use Arrange/Act/Assert.

prompts.prompt: Map server-side validation errors to fields for {form_case}.

prompts.label: Validation Rules & Error UX
prompts.prompt: Create validation rules for {form_case} with accessible errors and submit flow.

prompts.label: Bundle/Startup Optimization
prompts.prompt: Optimize startup/bundle size for {app} using code splitting, tree shaking, dependency audits.

prompts.prompt: Implement async fetching for {resource} with caching, retries, optimistic updates.

prompts.prompt: Handle side effects for {feature} with cancellation/debounce and error recovery.

prompts.prompt: Design state slices for {feature} with normalized entities and selectors.

prompts.prompt: Create an integration test setup for {target} including seeding, teardown, and assertions for success + failure.

prompts.label: Unit Tests (Edge Cases)
prompts.prompt: Write comprehensive unit tests for {target} focusing on edge cases, boundary values, and exception paths. Use Arrange/Act/Assert.

prompts.prompt: Write unit tests for Vue component {component} using Vitest and Vue Test Utils. Include DOM interaction, mocking composables/stores, and async assertions.

prompts.label: Razor Component (Parameters + EventCallbacks)
prompts.prompt: Create a Blazor Razor component for {feature} with strongly-typed [Parameter] properties, EventCallback outputs, validation-friendly forms, and accessibility. Include sample usage and a code-behind/partial class option.

prompts.label: Templated Component (RenderFragment)
prompts.prompt: Implement a templated Blazor component using RenderFragment/RenderFragment<T> for {component_name}. Include default templates, named fragments, and type-safe context usage. Provide examples.

prompts.label: EditForm + FluentValidation Pattern
prompts.prompt: Build a Blazor EditForm for {form_case} using DataAnnotations or FluentValidation. Show validation summary, field-level errors, async submit, and disabling submit while pending.

prompts.label: Layout + Reusable Page Shell
prompts.prompt: Create a Blazor layout for {app} including navigation menu, breadcrumbs, page title, and responsive design. Ensure ARIA landmarks and keyboard navigation.

prompts.label: Data Grid Pattern (Paging/Sorting/Filtering)
prompts.prompt: Implement a data grid pattern in Blazor for {entity} with paging, sorting, filtering, virtualization, and loading states. Separate UI from data service cleanly.

prompts.prompt: Design a Blazor state container for {feature} using a scoped service with change notifications. Include immutability guidance, event subscription disposal, and tests.

prompts.label: Fluxor/Redux-style State
prompts.prompt: Set up Fluxor (or equivalent) for {feature} in Blazor: state, actions, reducers, effects, and middleware for logging/errors. Include best practices and sample components.

prompts.prompt: Implement client-side caching for {resource} in Blazor (MemoryCache for Server or custom for WASM). Include invalidation and offline notes.

prompts.label: Form State (Dirty/Touched) Management
prompts.prompt: Track form dirty/touched state in Blazor for {form_case}. Include unsaved-changes guard and reset behavior.

prompts.prompt: Build a real-time Blazor UI update pattern for {scenario} using SignalR. Include reconnection strategy, throttling/batching updates, and disposing subscriptions.

prompts.prompt: Configure Blazor routing for {app} with route parameters, optional segments, query string parsing, and navigation helpers. Include NavLink active state examples.

prompts.prompt: Add NotFound routing and global error UI for {app}. Include ErrorBoundary usage, logging integration, and recovery actions.

prompts.prompt: Use NavigationLock to prevent losing unsaved changes for {page}. Provide confirm dialog UX and tests.

prompts.prompt: Set up OIDC auth for Blazor {hosting_model} (WASM/Server) with PKCE, token storage considerations, and secure logout. Include claims mapping and a protected page.

prompts.label: Authorization Policies & Roles
prompts.prompt: Implement role/claim-based authorization in Blazor using policies. Show AuthorizeView, [Authorize] attributes, and 401/403 UI handling.

prompts.prompt: Optimize Blazor JS interop for {scenario}: batching calls, minimizing serialization, and measuring impact.

prompts.prompt: Write bUnit tests for Blazor component {component}: render, parameters, events, cascading params, and assertions.

prompts.label: Mocking Services & DI

prompts.label: Testing Authorized UI

prompts.label: Testing Forms & Validation

prompts.prompt: Optimize Blazor WebAssembly startup for {app}: trimming, AOT, lazy loading, compression, caching, and measuring TTI.

prompts.prompt: Improve Blazor Server performance for {app}: circuit settings, render frequency, throttling updates, scaling considerations.

prompts.label: Rendering Optimization (Virtualize)
prompts.prompt: Refactor {list_page} using Virtualize, @key, and minimal re-render patterns. Include profiling steps.

prompts.label: Hosting Model Decision Guide

prompts.label: Observability for Blazor Apps
prompts.prompt: Add observability to Blazor {hosting_model}: logs, correlation IDs, traces, and performance metrics. Provide dashboards.

prompts.label: Task Decomposition & Plan
prompts.prompt: You are an agentic AI orchestrator. Given goal {goal}, constraints {constraints}, and context {context}, decompose into tasks with dependencies, acceptance criteria, and a verification plan. Output a step plan and a checklist.

prompts.label: Multi-Agent Role Design
prompts.prompt: Design a multi-agent team for {project}. Define roles (Architect, Developer, Reviewer, QA, SRE), responsibilities, handoff artifacts, and conflict resolution. Include message protocol and state schema.

prompts.label: Memory & Context Strategy
prompts.prompt: Propose memory strategy for agents on {project}: short-term context, long-term memory, retrieval, summarization cadence, and privacy boundaries. Include failure modes and mitigations.

prompts.label: Evaluation Harness for Agents
prompts.prompt: Design an evaluation harness for agent performance on {workflow}. Define metrics (success rate, latency, cost, safety), test suites, golden tasks, and regression process.

prompts.label: State Machine / Graph Workflow
prompts.prompt: Model an agent workflow for {use_case} as a state machine/graph: states, transitions, tools used, and stopping conditions. Output Mermaid diagram and pseudocode.

prompts.label: PR Automation Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt that implements change request {change_request}: create branch, edit files, run tests, and open PR with description, risk notes, and rollout plan. Include tool-call placeholders.

prompts.label: Refactoring Agent (Safe)
prompts.prompt: Write an agent prompt to refactor {module} safely: identify smells, propose steps, update code, update tests, and provide diff-oriented summary. No behavior change unless specified.

prompts.label: Debugging Agent (Repro-first)
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to debug {issue}: minimal repro, hypothesis list, instrumentation, targeted fix, and verification. Output root cause and prevention actions.

prompts.label: Documentation Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to generate/refresh documentation for {repo}: architecture overview, API docs, runbooks, onboarding. Ensure examples are accurate and point to source files.

prompts.label: Secure Fix Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to address security finding {finding}: least-privilege changes, validation, dependency upgrades, and tests. Include impact summary.

prompts.label: Test Generation Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to generate unit/integration tests for {component}. Require coverage of edge cases and deterministic execution.

prompts.label: Flaky Test Triage Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to triage flaky tests in {suite}: find nondeterminism, stabilize, and propose monitoring plan.

prompts.label: Quality Gates Agent
prompts.prompt: Design an agent prompt that enforces quality gates for {repo}: lint, tests, security scan, coverage, performance budgets. Provide remediation.

prompts.label: Load Test Scenario Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to design load tests for {endpoint_or_flow}: scenarios, ramp profile, SLAs, monitoring, analysis. Output k6/JMeter pseudo-config.

prompts.label: A11y/UX Review Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to review UI {screen} for accessibility and UX. Output actionable issues with severity and fixes.

prompts.label: Runbook Generator Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to generate operational runbook for {service}: alerts, dashboards, failures, mitigation, escalation, postmortem template.

prompts.label: Incident Triage Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to triage incident {incident}: timeline, blast radius, investigate logs/metrics/traces, mitigate, and follow-ups.

prompts.label: Deployment Planner Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to plan deployment for {release}: steps, canary, rollback, comms.

prompts.label: FinOps Cost Optimizer Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to optimize cloud cost for {workload}: identify spend, right-size, scaling, guardrails. Output prioritized actions.

prompts.label: IaC Generator Agent
prompts.prompt: Create an agent prompt to generate/update IaC for {platform} (Terraform/Bicep) with IAM least privilege, secrets handling, and validation steps.

prompts.label: RAG Architecture Prompt
prompts.prompt: Design a RAG system for {use_case}: chunking, embeddings, retrieval, reranking, citations, evaluation, ingestion pipeline, access controls.

prompts.label: Tool Catalog & Schemas
prompts.prompt: Create a tool catalog for agents in {domain}: inputs/outputs, errors, timeouts, idempotency, logging. Provide JSON schemas.

prompts.label: Git/CI Tool Interfaces
prompts.prompt: Specify tool interfaces for Git operations and CI checks for agent workflows. Add safety checks against destructive actions.

prompts.label: Vector Store Selection Guide
prompts.prompt: Compare vector store options for {constraints}: latency, cost, scale, filtering, multi-tenancy, backup/restore. Recommend and plan migration.

prompts.label: Agent Observability
prompts.prompt: Design observability for agent workflows: step/tool traces, prompt/version tracking, cost metrics, redaction, audit trails. Provide dashboards/alerts.

prompts.label: Guardrails Policy (Safety)
prompts.prompt: Define guardrails for agent {agent_name}: allowed tools, forbidden actions, approval gates, data access policies, escalation paths. Include examples.

prompts.label: Privacy & Data Handling
prompts.prompt: Create privacy policy for agent handling {data_types}: minimization, retention, redaction, access logs, incident response.

prompts.label: Human-in-the-Loop Controls
prompts.prompt: Design human-in-the-loop checkpoints for {workflow}: approvals, diff review, risk scoring, rollback. Provide reviewer prompt templates.

prompts.label: Prompt Injection & Tool Abuse Defense
prompts.prompt: Create defense plan against prompt injection/tool abuse for {agent_system}: sanitization, sandboxing, allowlists, and evaluation tests.

prompts.label: Auditability & Compliance Pack
prompts.prompt: Define audit logging and compliance evidence collection for agent actions in {org}: immutable logs, traceability to tickets, retention.
